Title: Provides the option for candidates for office and petition witnesses not to put their address on designation petitions
Summary: Relates to enacting the "Esther Salas candidate privacy act" providing the option for candidates for office and petition witnesses not to put their address on designation petitions but instead file such with the county clerk for a fee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to providing the option for candidates for office and petition witnesses not to put their address on designation petitions
